material: coated metal (likely neoprene or vinyl), cast-iron core
usage: gym exercise, strength training, fitness workouts
key_features: Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
ai_description: The images show KAKSS brand dumbbells with a smooth, matte finish in vibrant colors including pink, red, blue and green. The dumbbells feature hexagon-shaped edges to prevent rolling and have weight markings (0.5KG, 1KG, 2KG, 3KG, 5KG) printed in white on the ends. They appear to have a thick vinyl or neoprene coating over a cast-iron core, providing a comfortable, non-slip grip. Lifestyle shots show people using them for various exercises in home and outdoor settings. The product is marketed as proudly made in India.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts, home gym users, individuals seeking exercise equipment
